content: these slippers left on photo are knitted from the toe up the details in burnt orange are made with duplicate stitch size 42/43 unstretched sole size approx 26 cm needles 4 mm & 4 5 mm us 6 & 7 or size needed to obtain gauge yarn novita icelandic wool 2 skeins 100g 044 graphite 1 skein 50g 010 off-white less than 1 skein of 663 burnt orange gauge 21 sts and 21 row = 10 cm /4 inches in colorwork patt
